page.title: 16wrentham School
page.content: In 1984 our school was 150 years old and we all dressed up as they did at that time. We even had an old-fashioned meal. There are 69 children. We have two playgrounds, one for football, and the other for other games. We also have a big meadow. Every year we have a Sports Day, a Carol Service, a concert and other events. We have three classrooms and three teachers. Their names are Mrs Price, Mr Moult and Miss Bauers. In Mr Moult's class the age is 5-7. In Mrs Price's class the age is 7-9. In Miss Bauers' class the age is 9-11. We wear red jumpers for our uniform with red and white checked dresses for girls in the summer.
